ci_support_linux_64_.yaml:
cdt_name:
- cos6
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-cos7-x86_64

about.description:
Are you confident in your tests?
Try out mutatest and see if your tests will detect small modifications (mutations) in the code.
Surviving mutations represent subtle changes that are undetectable by your tests.
Mutatest modifies the pycache, not your source code, and has multiple running modes.
about.summary: Python mutation testing: test your tests!

about.description:
Are you confident in your tests?
Try out mutatest and see if your tests will detect small modifications (mutations) in the code.
Surviving mutations represent subtle changes that are undetectable by your tests.
Mutatest modifies the pycache, not your source code, and has multiple running modes.
about.summary: Python mutation testing: test your tests!

name: mutatest
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set name = "mutatest" %}
{% set version = "3.1.0" %}

package:
  name: {{ name|lower }}
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  url: https://pypi.io/packages/source/{{ name[0] }}/{{ name }}/{{ name }}-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 274ecf0d10b68a7c6f9753788912cc82a7c39e505fc3f0b215d0b57efd7bff52

build:
  noarch: python
  number: 0
  script: {{ PYTHON }} -m pip install . -vv
  entry_points:
    - mutatest = mutatest.cli:cli_main

requirements:
  host:
    - python ==3.8
    - pip
  run:
    - python ==3.8
    - coverage >=4.4,<6.0
    - typing-extensions

test:
  imports:
    - mutatest
  requires:
    - coverage >=4.4,<6.0
    - pytest
    - freezegun
    - hypothesis
    - pytest-cov
  source_files:
    - pytest.ini
  commands:
    - pytest --pyargs mutatest
    - mutatest -h

about:
  home: https://github.com/EvanKepner/mutatest
  license: MIT
  license_family: MIT
  license_file: LICENSE
  summary: 'Python mutation testing: test your tests!'
  description: |
    Are you confident in your tests?
    Try out mutatest and see if your tests will detect small modifications (mutations) in the code.
    Surviving mutations represent subtle changes that are undetectable by your tests.
    Mutatest modifies the pycache, not your source code, and has multiple running modes.
  doc_url: https://mutatest.readthedocs.io/
  dev_url: https://github.com/EvanKepner/mutatest

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - EvanKepner
